message: http://www.take2.co.za/img/take2_2009.png
It's also relatively new, so it's got a slick and clean modern interface.
Sorry for cleaning out the other thread, but this is the thread that opens by default (ugh) when someone clicks the group, so I thought I'd reorganize it a little.
Click here (or up where it says Take2 in the top left) to get to the group main page, which lists all the threads: https://convore.com/take2/
This is Convore! It's a forum/chat hybrid that combines the instantaneity of IM with the persistence and threading of forums.
This is neat!
It's great, right!
As I said to Neilan earlier, this'd be great for a live group-chat during the E3 keynotes.  For, uh, those of us not otherwise occupied.
Hah. I'd actually forgotten about that momentarily when we were talking about it earlier. :<
The Convore iPhone app is great, but still needs some work.  Chiefly, landscape-mode text entry.  And a way to see more than one line of text when editing.
This is a test from convoread -- https://github.com/foobarbuzz/convoread
Ha, I see we're a trending group.
I'm not sure what that says about Convore…

That hardly anyone's using it (yet)? Yeah. Even if you just look at the number of users in the most popular groups, it's shockingly low. I wouldn't be surprised if the total userbase has yet to breach 10000.
That's not a bad thing, I guess. It'll start sucking more when the hoi polloi arrive, no doubt. Also, I'll be so bold as to predict that scaling will be an issue. Twitter's growing pains, anyone?
Mmm... Interesting
One thing I realized we're missing, spoiler tags. :\
What are you talking about?  Of course we can use ███████ whenever we want!
You got me. :(
Hello hello all :)
Be vewwy vewwy quiet. I'm hunting wabbits.
OH NO.  SHE FOUND US.
The convore iphone app works very well i see. I'll try the ipad app later.
There are definitely things they can improve on the iPhone app, but it's a decent start.
Well Hel-LO!  :)
Hello. :) Took me a while to get here. >.<
Hope you don't mind me sneaking in here :)
FULL HOUSE!
So Alpha was the probably the last to find out about this carnivorousness thingamajig .... :(
Hah! I just saw you on twitter, and started thinking ... hey has he posted AT ALL? Don't know how you missed it. :(
Hijacking thread for announcement.
